Chapter: About Leaflet Storymaps - Test if csv works
Description: The Leaflet Storymaps code template is designed to guide readers along a point-by-point tour
Right-click on the tiny "View data" link at the bottom of the map to open the contents of the linked Google Sheet in a new tab. Each row is a chapter

Media Credit: Screenshot of Zoom and Marker columns in linked Google Sheet
Description: You can display multi-part chapters for one location by creating a series of rows in the Google Sheet. List the Chapter and Location information only in the first row of the series

Chapter: March on Washington at Lincoln Memorial
I Have A Dream Speech by Dr. King

Media Credit: Google Sheet row number - 1 = hash number displayed in web browser.
Description: The code template assigns each chapter a unique web address that ends with a numerical hashtag (such as ...#13). This means you can send people links to specific chapters
To learn more about the Leaflet Storymaps with Google Sheets template
